stories.original_headline: This breakthrough could finally unlock male birth control
stories.original_summary: Scientists at Michigan State University have uncovered the molecular “switch” that powers sperm for their final, high-speed dash toward an egg. By tracking how sperm use glucose as fuel, the team discovered how dormant cells suddenly flip into overdrive, burning energy in a carefully controlled, mul
stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Uncover Secret Switch in Life-Giving Essences!
stories.fantasy_story: The Alchemists' Guild has made a wondrous discovery, revealing a hidden magical switch within life-giving essences. This switch, fueled by vital energy, propels the essences on their final journey. Understanding this mechanism could lead to powerful new potions for controlling the flow of life.

stories.original_headline: Couples who savor happy moments together have stronger, longer-lasting relationships
stories.original_summary: Couples who intentionally slow down and soak in their happy moments together may be building a powerful shield for their relationship. Researchers at the University of Illinois found that partners who regularly savor shared experiences—whether reminiscing about a favorite memory, enjoying a dinner t
stories.fantasy_headline: Wise Sages Reveal Secret to Everlasting Love Bonds!
stories.fantasy_story: Scholars of the Heart have unveiled an ancient truth: pairs of sweethearts who cherish their shared joys forge an unbreakable bond. By reliving pleasant memories or savoring peaceful moments, they weave a protective enchantment around their devotion. This wisdom ensures their love blossoms for many seasons.

stories.original_headline: The Pocket Taco is the best way to turn your phone into a Game Boy
stories.original_summary: My ongoing quest to turn my iPhone into one of my favorite consoles of all time has led me to a curiously named controller. GameSir's Pocket Taco is only barely pocketable, and distinctly lacking in taco fillings, but for $35, it's an excellent and easy way to turn your phone into a Game Boy-inspire
stories.fantasy_headline: New Device Transforms Scrying Mirror into Arcane Puzzle Box!
stories.fantasy_story: A new artifact from the Guild of Artificers can transform a common scrying mirror into an ancient Puzzle Box of Amusements. This clever device, while odd in name, attaches easily to the mirror. For a mere 35 gold coins, wanderers can carry a portable source of endless fun.
